name: Axe
description: A long-handled tool used for chopping and splitting wood. Effective melee weapon.

name: Ceramic Knife
description: Tanto-style long knife made of high-density ceramic. Sharp as glass and retains edge longer than steel.

name: Club
description: Any sort of heavy, blunt object used as an improvised weapon.

name: Katana
description: Japanese-style longsword renowned for quality and connection to samurai ideals.

name: Knife
description: Basic hunting or utility knife, not typically balanced for throwing.

name: Hatchet
description: Small, short-handled axe used for camping. Can be thrown effectively.

name: Long Sword
description: Typical long-bladed slashing weapon, such as the Cold Mountain Demon-sword.

name: Short Sword
description: Short-bladed weapon, like a machete.

name: Wakizashi
description: Japanese-style shortsword, almost always made as a pair with the longer katana.

name: Wire Knife
description: Hyperdiamond single-fiber blade originally designed for beanstalk construction. Extremely sharp and fragile.

name: Shock Baton
description: Stun weapon intended for police and prison work. Power cell good for 20 shocks.

name: Shock Glove
description: Heavy workgloves with electrical contacts. More likely to be used by security guards and military. Power cells arm-mounted.

name: Sick Stick
description: Prisoner/riot control device. Victims become nauseated and violently ill. Non-lethal but incapacitating.

name: M-2 Assault Rifle
description: Traylor Arms M-2 'nine fourty-four'. Popular with paramilitary organizations. Simple and reliable.

name: Stracher SG-77
description: Sturmgewehr-2277. Widely exported surplus rifle. Still effective despite being replaced in service.

name: Wu-Beijing Type-49
description: Rarity among modern military arms. Uses old-style conventional layout with trigger-magazine-barrel design.

name: Giscard FC-70
description: Hunting rifle designed to use 7.5mm surplus ammunition. Low firing cost makes it popular for sport.

name: Rockwell 12-81 Magnum
description: Most powerful sporting rifle in known space. Only fires from rest with bipod. High first-round killing power.

name: Stracher SS-7
description: Only mass-produced air rifle used as a hunting weapon. Powered by compressed air from central reservoir.

name: Stracher Wolf Hunting Shotgun
description: Classic over/under double-barrelled shotgun. Luxury item with engraved barrel and custom wood furniture.

name: Traylor Model 10 Riot Gun
description: Short-barrelled folding-stock shotgun. Favorite with Frontier colonists and police services.

name: DunArmCo Close Assault Gun
description: Fully-automatic shotgun. Often used by police and anti-insurgent forces. Also used in light attack drones.

name: Hancock Nine-Twenty-Three Enforcer
description: Common American police and personal defense weapon. Plastic speed-loader allows all rounds in one action.

name: Rockwell 12-39 Magnum
description: Most powerful production handgun in human space. Companion hunting weapon for the 12-81 Magnum rifle.

name: Stracher Modell 6
description: Compact pistol using same high-velocity ammunition as MP-67 series.

name: Stracher P11mm (Pistole 11mm Magnum)
description: Most powerful production magazine-fed handgun in human space.

name: Traylor Model 57 (Chip Traylor Special)
description: Common American military and police weapon. Typical light semi-automatic pistol.

name: Stracher MP-67 PDW
description: High-powered 6mm personal defense weapon. Designed for rear-echelon troops and vehicle crews. Popular with SWAT teams.

name: Stracher MP-67K Compact
description: Smaller cousin of MP-67. Little bigger than a large pistol with almost same firepower.

name: Traylor T-50 Assault Pistol
description: Small selective fire weapon favored by criminals and agents. Small size makes it hard to control in full auto.

name: DunArmCo Mini-12
description: Virtually a small cannon. Found in virtually all militaries as heavy infantry support weapon.

name: MG-7
description: Small-calibre machine gun designed as companion to SG-77 rifle using same ammunition.

name: Wu-Beijing Type 381
description: Typical medium machinegun found in arsenals throughout human space.

name: Brandt Audionique AS-3
description: Sonic stunner often used by police and security guards. Power pack worn separately on belt.

name: Quinn Optronics Restraint Carbine
description: Heavier sonic stun carbine for high-risk situations. More powerful but cumbersome.
